title: Grimind (Edelweiss) (ENG/MULTi2)
description:
Info:
Year: 2012
Genre: Adventure / Platformer
Developer: Edelweiss
Publisher: Edelweiss
Language: English, Polish
Sound Language: English
Publication Type: License
Medicine: Not required

System Requirements:
Operating System: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8
CPU: 2 GHz
Memory: 1 GB
Video Card: 256 MB
Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
Hard Disk Space: 150 MB

Description:
The game takes us into a dark dungeon, which we will pass an unknown creature, simultaneously solving puzzles along the way. We have to ask questions about who I am and what I'm doing here, wandering among its own dark thoughts and go in search of answers to their questions. It may even be lucky enough to know you who our hero really is.
